page.title: 20GIRLS FASHION
page.content:
Girls aged between eight and eleven like wearing ski trousers or short skirts with a tee shirt or sweat shirt. Big earings, beads and bangles in bright colours like red, blue, yellow, white and orange are popular. Watches usually have games on them as well as alarms. Some girls wear wrist bands with names of pop groups on, like"WHAM". Girls wear pointed shoes, roman sandals, canvas shoes or trainers. Girls with long hair wear clips called crocodile or butterfly clips. Girls with short hair have it permed or flicked. Most girls of this age do not wear make up, except for special occasions.
By Michelle Heap. Aged 10.
